import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Cart } from '../../shared/cart.model'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/services/cart.service'; import { CartItem } from '../../shared/cartItem.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart-page', templateUrl: './cart-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart-page.component.scss'] }) export class CartPageComponent implements OnInit { cart!: Cart; @Input() shippingCharges: number = 0; constructor(private cartService: CartService) { this.cartService.getCartObservable().subscribe((cart) => { this.cart = cart; }); } ngOnInit(): void { } removeFromCart(cartItem: CartItem) { this.cartService.removeFromCart(cartItem.food.id); } changeQuantity(cartItem: CartItem, quantityInString: string) { const quantity = parseInt(quantityInString); this.cartService.changeQuantity(cartItem.food.id, quantity); } }
